name: mushroom staff
description: I converted a wood-like cocoon into a weapon. It is a stranger to look at swinging the ax, but let's put up with it.

name: mushroom hammer
description: An umbrella with a hard stone like a hammer. It is inferior to a proper tool and weapon, but it is quite easy to use.

name: mushroom sledge
description: It is a hammer for crushing buildings, etc. Thanks to the adjustments made to one point of power, it is very fragile and will break just by shaking it.

name: mushroom spear
description: It is a mushroom with a sharp umbrella. If you pierce into the enemy's body, the umbrella will rotate and you will easily get a deadly wound through the wound. The rotating umbrella also helps with corpse dismantling.
